How many people are affected by Werner syndrome ?,"Werner syndrome is estimated to affect 1 in 200,000 individuals in the United States. This syndrome occurs more often in Japan, affecting 1 in 20,000 to 1 in 40,000 people.",GHR,Werner syndrome
